markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Cartwheel Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2213) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Provocator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=87)

**Prerequisites**
[Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211)

**Trigger**
You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

**Requirements**
You aren't [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) or overburdened.

</column>

---

You Step up to 10 feet.
name: Cartwheel Dodge
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211)

**Trigger**
You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

**Requirements**
You aren't [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) or overburdened.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can dodge away from damaging effects.
</summary>
summary: You can dodge away from damaging effects.
